markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nothing but Fluff](/Feats.aspx?ID=3347) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Poppet" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=418" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 64</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Stuffed Poppet](/Heritages.aspx?ID=189) heritage

</column>

---

Your fluffy interior lacks specific organs and struts, with few weak spots to injure. You gain resistance to precision damage equal to half your level.
name: Nothing but Fluff
